abilities.title: Natural Climber
abilities.description: Trolls are instinctive climbers (75%/65%) and swimmers (60%). Nightvision 60 ft (18.3 m), excellent day vision (human norm).

abilities.title: Ferocious Assault
abilities.description: Trolls gain +1 additional attack/action per melee round. Clawed hands inflict 2D6 damage +P.S. bonus, kick 3D6 +P.S. bonus, bite 2D4 damage (no P.S. bonus).
